page.title: 13LIFE TODAY IN ST.ASAPH.
page.content: LIFE TODAY On a typical Monday morning in July a survey was conducted on life in St. Asaph. 85% of the people interviewed lived in St.Asaph,and the rest in the surrounding districts.85% of the people interviewed were female 40% of which were widowed, the remaining 15% being men.20% of the interviewed were married, 15% of these were female and 5% male. 30% of the people were not married. Most of the people interviewed had no children, but the majority of families had 2 children other people had 1 or 3 children and 2:20 had 4. A majority of people considered unemployment as the worst problem facing Wales today, the others suggested drugs and english immigrants.
